arts.ttl: Udinese 0 – Milan 3 | Youssouf Fofana: “We are on the right track”
arts.sum: Youssouf Fofana scored a goal against Udinese in the 0-3 win at the Bluenergy stadium. The French midfielder discussed the victory with the media in a post-match press conference: "What happened to this team? Nothing happened. We have worked well since pre-season, the coach does an incredible job. We are aggressive, we want to do […]

arts.ttl: Udinese 0 – Milan 3 | Pulisic: “We have to keep going like this”
arts.sum: Christian Pulisic, Player of the Match in Udinese-Milan, spoke to DAZN after the game. His words: How many POTM awards do you have at home? "I don’t know (laughs). Maybe ten. But the important thing is the win." About Modric and Rabiot: "We have a team with many strong players. Modric and his experience help […]

arts.ttl: Allegri’s assistant Landucci praises Milan’s ‘spirit’ after Udinese win: “Fruits of hard work”
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Massimiliano Allegri’s assistant Marco Landucci has insisted the AC Milan squad will not celebrate their win over Udinese for too long. Landucci was the man barking orders from the sidelines once again as Allegri served a touchline ban following his red card in the Bologna game. arts.ttl: Udinese 0 – Milan 3 | The Rossoneri shine thanks to Pulisic’s brace
arts.sum: The match report of Udinese-Milan, which just ended 0-3 at the Bluenergy Stadium, valid for the fourth round of Serie A. arts.ttl: Udinese 0-3 AC Milan: Pulisic inspires Rossoneri to dominant third straight win
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan took another big step forward in their start to the 2025-26 season with a comprehensive 3-0 win away from home against Udinese.
